means: 哥谭镇，愚人村，纽约市的别名

sentence.Network_en: You can get in touch with him by calling the Gotham Hotel.

sentence.Network_en: Al Ghul : Gotham's time has come.

sentence.Network_en: This may go down well in Gotham.
sentence.Network_cn: 这在纽约市可能见怪不怪.
